title: UnaliWear Kanega Watch Reviews: Written By Customers in 2025
body: The UnaliWear Kanega Watch is a more discreet alternative to traditional medical alert devices. The watch weighs 49 grams (about 1.7 ounces). It's 1.6 inches in diameter and 0.5 inches thick. It ...

title: UnaliWear Medical Alert Watch Review (2025) - Forbes Health
body: UnaliWear offers two monitoring subscription options for the Kanega Watch: the annual plan and the monthly plan. For the annual plan, users pay for device setup and 12 months of service upfront.
